metadata.query_text: You can quickly share a link to a PDF document with others for viewing or commenting. The document shared as a link opens in any browser on any device. The document is stored securely in Adobe cloud storage. Recipients get an email with a link, and they can click the link to view and comment on the document in a browser; no sign-in is required.

extracted_sections.section_title: Create a PDF and share the link for viewing or commenting

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Introducción a la tecnología de documentación en línea, donde los documentos se almacenan en el almacén de archivos de Adobe Cloud y se abren con un vínculo. Los destinatarios reciben una email con un vínculo para ver y comentar el documento desde cualquier dispositivo. Solo proporciona un resumen sin mencionar a la persona o cargo de responsabilidad, sólo proporcionando un resumen conciso y directo.

For HR professionals seeking to quickly distribute PDF documents with secure storage, Adobe Cloud offers a "Link" feature that enables easy sharing and collaboration. The link is sent as an email attachment, providing recipients access to view and comment on the document in a browser. Only providing a brief summary without mentioning the persona or job title in the response would suffice.

Simply provide a quick summary of the text for HR professionals looking to share PDF documents with others as an e-signature option, which allows recipients to view and comment on the document in any browser. The document is stored securely in Adobe cloud storage, and only provides one or two sentences to convey the main point without mentioning the job or persona.

Introducing a simple way to share PDF documents with others without leaving your email or login details. Simply click on a link, which opens the file as a new tab or window in any web browser on any device. The document is stored securely in Adobe cloud storage, and recipients only need an email account to access it. The recipient can open the PDF document with their web browser, sign it using their preferred signature style, select and upload their own signature image, enter their mobile number and receive a link for signing in on a mobile device. After downloading the document, they can save it to their cloud storage for future reuse or share with others.

Suitable for HR professionals who seek to quickly share a PDF document with others for viewing or commenting, the 'Acrobat' software offers easy access through a secure cloud storage platform. The link is sent via email, and recipients receive an email containing a one-click download link. Only providing a brief summary, this software ensures that only the most essential information is presented to avoid unnecessary details or confusion.
